title: Cash-Strapped Saks Skips Bond Payment Amid Talks With Creditors
description: Saks Global Enterprises, the cash-strapped retailer, skipped an interest payment to bondholders totaling more than $100 million that was due Tuesday as it looks to negotiate a deal with creditors, according to people familiar with the situation.
content: Saks Global Enterprises, the cash-strapped retailer, skipped an interest payment to bondholders totaling more than $100 million that was due Tuesday as it looks to negotiate a deal with creditors, according to people familiar with the situation.
